morningBrief.headline: 8" of Fresh Overnight
morningBrief.body: Powder alert: 8" of fresh overnight means soft conditions across the mountain. Nearly full mountain access with 118 of 123 trails spinning. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: Dump Day at Sugarbush
morningBrief.body: It's a 6" day. You know what to do. First chair or regret it. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: 3" Freshened Things Up
morningBrief.body: 3" settled in while you were sleeping. Groomers are smooth, off-piste is soft. Nearly full mountain access with 85 of 85 trails spinning. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: Variable Conditions
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 166 trails open, 34 groomed. Cloud/Sun/Mixed with temps around 32. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. It's going to be a mixed bag today. Expect rain below and snow above.

morningBrief.headline: Nice Little Top-Up
morningBrief.body: A proper refresh: 4" of new snow making everything ski better. Nearly full mountain access with 125 of 128 trails spinning. Heads up: Mansfield Gondola peaked at 21 minutes yesterday. Consider alternatives.
